body.p:
Crab Orchard Ky May 12/64
Hon. Tho. E Bramlette Gov. of Ky.
Dear Sir
In the year 1848 the legislature of Ky. incorporated the town of Craborchard Ky. & adopted the charter of the town of Somerset Ky as the charter of the town of Craborchard so far as applicable.

Said charter (approved Feb 18th 1846) directs that a police judge for said town shall be recommended by the trustees and appointed & commissioned by the Governor for one year. Having no police judge, the undersigned, trustees of the town of Crab Orchard Ky respectfully recommend to your Honor J. E. Carson as a suitable person to be appointed & commissioned as police judge of said town

Respectfully
Trustees
M. Luce
W. P. Hansford
John Edmiston
John Buchanan

Police Judge of Crab Orchard
apptd
13th May 1864
